fields.Title: WHIRLING / KIM MAIN
fields.Description: These are the rest of Kims MAIN dialogues with you after he's in the squad.

fields.Dialogue Text: It's barely a secret. Everyone's smoked hemp.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He simply nods."
fields.Dialogue Text: He simply nods.

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "Passing along frivolous inter-depar..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Passing along frivolous inter-departmental stereotypes is not usually his *oeuvre*. He regrets bringing it up.

fields.Title: You: ""But what if I need some *me* time?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "But what if I need some *me* time?"

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "The RCM, or the Revachol Citizens M..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The RCM, or the Revachol Citizens Militia, is the police force you and him are part of. A self-organized peace corps of the occupied city of Revachol, the RCM operates within a legal twilight, yet its authority is rarely questioned. Wouldn't it be embarrassing if you didn't know this?

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You might," he nods. "It's importa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You might," he nods. "It's important not to let one's *style* interfere with their work."

fields.Title: You: ""I'm talking serious, unbelievable..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm talking serious, unbelievable damage here."
fields.Alternate1: "I'm talking serious, unbelievable damage here. I saw myself in the mirror and had no idea who I was."

fields.Title: You: ""Okay, then.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay, then."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Excuse me. I was lecturing you. I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Excuse me. I was lecturing you. I shouldn't have. You should consult a medical professional if you feel that you need help. You can use the radio in my Kineema to call your station's *lazareth*."

fields.Title: You: ""What's wrong with personal affairs?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What's wrong with personal affairs?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He corrects his glasses. "I say thi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He corrects his glasses. "I say this from a purely tactical standpoint of course."

fields.Title: You: ""Okay then.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay then."

fields.Title: You: ""Yes.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes."

fields.Title: Half Light: "Oh no, you're a cop, you can't go t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Oh no, you're a cop, you can't go to jail...

fields.Title: You: "(Point to the ground.) "For the mur..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Point to the ground.) "For the murder."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But isn't that *our* job?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "But isn't that *our* job?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""If I were trying to get in touch w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "If I were trying to get in touch with the Coalition, I would start by seeking him out. But first you might need to speak with his *young companion*."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""If you're trying to get in touch w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "If you're trying to get in touch with the Coalition, I would start by finding some way to apologise to him. But first you might need to speak with his *young companion*."

fields.Title: You: ""Talk of this..." (Consider the phr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Talk of this..." (Consider the phrasing.) "...pissing competition worries me. What stupidity is this?"

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "A common accounting gimmick used to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A common accounting gimmick used to inflate precinct stats.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He thinks for a second. "Okay, mayb..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He thinks for a second. "Okay, maybe I do."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""A good joke.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "A good joke."

fields.Title: You: ""Okay, it was a poor joke. But we c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay, it was a poor joke. But we could use a good mannered Cop Off, don't you agree?"

fields.Title: You: ""I don't have that -- I have someth..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't have that -- I have something cooler. What was that? Mambo and Jambo?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Then why did they send you?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Then why did they send you?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's always good to have a police..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's always good to have a police officer who can see and feel."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Kim Kitsuragi: "A moment passes. The lieutenant gla..."]
Jump to: [KIM SWITCH / TWINS AND RADIO]
You: ""I was just wondering what brand of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I was just wondering what brand of aftershave you use."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Sorry, I'm really no expert on thi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sorry, I'm really no expert on this sort of thing..."

fields.Title: You: ""That was a cheap shot.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "That was a cheap shot."

fields.Title: You: ""I know, I know -- stunning, right?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I know, I know -- stunning, right?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'd appreciate it if you didn't fo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'd appreciate it if you didn't force us into situations where I may have to shoot random civilians. Because that won't get us anywhere."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Excuse me. I was lecturing you. I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Excuse me. I was lecturing you. I shouldn't have. You should consult a medical professional if you feel that you need help."

fields.Title: You: ""So you're saying your brain *never..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So you're saying your brain *never* just chimes in with advice or warnings or *anything*?"

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "You may not *remember* taking any l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You may not *remember* taking any little 'tests', but you're strong as a goddamn ox. Anyone can see that!

fields.Title: Logic: "The thing is, the RCM employs relat..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The thing is, the RCM employs relatively few *oxen*. It's clear that what the lieutenant may lack in *musculature* he makes up for in other ways.
Gradually turn your head and let your brow rise untethered.
"Is that enough of a secret for you?"
After decades unchallenged, the lieutenant is caught off-guard by your brazen provocation, but his counter comes fast and hard. This could get ugly...
"Kim, you son of a bitch..."
"No, there are couple of people who haven't smoked cannabis. I'm sure of that."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Except that I *do*, detective.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Except that I *do*, detective."

fields.Title: You: ""So what *should* I concentrate on?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "So what *should* I concentrate on?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This psycho-drama is unbecoming of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This psycho-drama is unbecoming of an officer."

fields.Title: You: ""It's not psychological. Some sort..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's not psychological. Some sort of major brain damage has occurred. On an unprecedented scale."

fields.Title: Half Light: "Your heart beats twice, like a fist..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Your heart beats twice, like a fist. The serotonin deficiency makes your teeth clench.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Not a fan. It's just the nature of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Not a fan. It's just the nature of lieutenancy."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I think the dispatch desk just tol..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I think the dispatch desk just told both our stations about the hanging. There was quite the brouhaha at the 57th, I can tell you that. 'Time to *settle it*', they said, '*Cop Off*'. But..." He leans in: "I assure you, I am not their *finest* or *toughest*, with *one hundred-and-two cases solved*. What I am is *least interested in a pissing competition*."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "The weary tone is the surest indica..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The weary tone is the surest indicator that the lieutenant is being *sarcastic*.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's commendable. Was there anyt..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's commendable. Was there anything else?"

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Only banal things strike you. At th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Only banal things strike you. At the core, you're a very banal person, with a very small soul.

fields.Title: You: ""Are you sure? I think something is..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Are you sure? I think something is already happening."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He looks at his pants. "Where is th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He looks at his pants. "Where is this going?"

fields.Title: You: ""I was sent to teach you a lesson i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I was sent to teach you a lesson in *style*."

fields.Title: You: ""Can we go over the preliminary inf..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Can we go over the preliminary info again?"

fields.Title: Empathy: "That's where his conversations with..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That's where his conversations with himself take place.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He turns his attention elsewhere."
fields.Dialogue Text: He turns his attention elsewhere.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""... but *am* I? I'll spare you ano..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "... but *am* I? I'll spare you another twenty hours thinking about it -- yes, I am. Now let's get back to work."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""If you ask me, it's high time for..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "If you ask me, it's high time for you to set aside these frivolous *side tasks* and focus 100% of your energies on the case before us."

fields.Title: You: ""At least let me have my cigarettes..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "At least let me have my cigarettes, Kim. I only smoke them for the bonuses."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""They didn't identify themselves in..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "They didn't identify themselves in any way. The tone was muffled using a device of some sort. The desk could identify neither the caller's age nor sex."

fields.Title: Composure: "This man has sharp, precise composu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This man has sharp, precise composure, without impatience. Years of being himself have whittled the tension down to readiness. He is at home in what must be a subtly thought out set of apparel. Do you even have anything to teach him?

fields.Title: You: ""Because I have that.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Because I have that."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""If you could only find your gun.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "If you could only find your gun."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Detective, about what the twins ha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Detective, about what the twins had to say..."

fields.Title: You: ""I think you should know that I can..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I think you should know that I can't remember *anything*."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""... Alright then.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "... Alright then."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What is this place?" The lieutenan..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What is this place?" The lieutenant stares at the dusty training equipment.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Yes, you killed him. And then, as p..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes, you killed him. And then, as part of the plan, you drowned out the memory...

fields.Title: You: "Keep it to yourself. This is your b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Keep it to yourself. This is your burden to bear now.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I think we may have this..." The l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I think we may have this..." The lieutenant whispers, then gives the suspect a short glance.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay. What do you think is going o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay. What do you think is going on with that computer, chalkboard, and fireplace?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hmmm, that's a fair point. Alright..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hmmm, that's a fair point. Alright, for the good of the investigation, what do you want to know?"

fields.Title: You: ""You're wearing glasses.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're wearing glasses."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant produces his small b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant produces his small blue notebook and idly thumbs through a few pages.
fields.Alternate1: The lieutnant produces his familiar Mnemotechnique A6 and idly thumbs through a few pages.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""For real detective work, nothing b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "For real detective work, nothing beats a good notebook by your side..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It will turn into quite the puzzle..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It will turn into quite the puzzle yet, I'm afraid..." The lieutenant nods.

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "That makes him a *binoclard*. Compl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That makes him a *binoclard*. Completely un-cop material, if you say so yourself.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Something the matter, detective?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Something the matter, detective?"

fields.Title: You: "(Flex your bicep.) "Check it: I was..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Flex your bicep.) "Check it: I was made to crack skulls and solve cases."
"Orange patrol cap. I can't think of anything else."
fields.Alternate1: "Black patrol cap. I can't think of anything else."

fields.Dialogue Text: He's waiting for a reaction.
An almost unbearable tension fills the room. The hairs of your back stand up.
"Okay, maybe you don't need an orange patrol cap. Let me think of something else."
fields.Alternate1: "Okay, maybe you don't need a black patrol cap. Let me think of something else."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes?"

fields.Title: You: ""Okay, I'll leave the self-care for..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay, I'll leave the self-care for non-work hours."

fields.Title: You: ""Okay, so the case *probably* isn't..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay, so the case *probably* isn't mysterious -- but could it be *sexy*?"

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Is this a *strike* then -- or the f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Is this a *strike* then -- or the first shots in a *workers' coup*?

fields.Title: Empathy: "There is a sudden, harsh edge to hi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There is a sudden, harsh edge to his voice. Like he's tired of hearing about your "personal affairs."

fields.Title: You: ""What do you mean?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What do you mean?"

fields.Title: You: ""I don't remember being in on anyth..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't remember being in on anything."

fields.Title: You: ""It isn't. But I will prove it so.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "It isn't. But I will prove it so."

fields.Title: You: ""Maybe there's a young woman involv..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Maybe there's a young woman involved?!"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I do not have a *thing* with revol..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I do not have a *thing* with revolutionary air brigades in particular."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Ah, yes. The case brief you missed..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ah, yes. The case brief you missed. Now I remember." He opens his notes.

fields.Title: Drama: "LIE! LIE TO GET OUT OF IT!"
fields.Dialogue Text: LIE! LIE TO GET OUT OF IT!

fields.Title: You: ""You are?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You are?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Wonderful." He does not seem surpr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wonderful." He does not seem surprised. "What is your takeaway?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You mean like a brief? Do you want..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You mean like a brief? Do you want me to brief you again?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It would be immensely ugly of them..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It would be immensely ugly of them, not to mention unprofessional.... But I also think it's somewhat unlikely."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant's quizzical expressi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant's quizzical expression gradually deepens into a frown.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Simple, because Moralintern types..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Simple, because Moralintern types *love* to form committees."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You know who might be, though? Tha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You know who might be, though? That Mr. Villedrouin, the uh... gentleman you needlessly antagonised in the apartments..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You know who might be, though? Tha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You know who might be, though? That Mr. Villedrouin, the uh... gentleman you met in the young man's apartment..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""They -- Klaasje, as we've come to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "They -- Klaasje, as we've come to suspect -- didn't identify themselves in any way. The tone was muffled using a device of some sort. The desk could identify neither the caller's age nor sex."

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Jean Vicquemare, Judit Minot... A s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Jean Vicquemare, Judit Minot... A special consultant... what was his name? Then the rows degrade into green nothingness.

fields.Title: You: "Close your eyes."
fields.Dialogue Text: Close your eyes.

fields.Title: You: "(Point to yourself.) "This is what..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Point to yourself.) "This is what a *modern* cop looks like."

fields.Title: You: "(Loosen your shoulders.) "You shoul..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Loosen your shoulders.) "You should ease up a bit. You need more *looseness*."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't need a patrol cap.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't need a patrol cap."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It can't be that..." Part of him s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It can't be that..." Part of him sort of wants to believe what you just said.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Wouldn't that be something? And wh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wouldn't that be something? And who could say it's not true? If you really don't remember anything... how would you know?" The thought makes him uneasy. "We should move."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Strange. You're not getting any str..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Strange. You're not getting any strong *ideological whiffs* from the lieutenant.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Sort of like how hanging around th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sort of like how hanging around the liquor store hasn't made you into a master distiller."

fields.Title: You: ""I knew I shouldn't shave! I knew i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I knew I shouldn't shave! I knew it and still did it. What an idiot..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Looks like we have more to discuss..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Looks like we have more to discuss with those so-called *Hardie boys*." His voice is lowered. "Half their reasoning just went out the window."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You can always use the radio in my..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You can always use the radio in my Kineema to call your station's lazareth again. Was there anything else you wanted?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Anyhow, let's get back to the case..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Anyhow, let's get back to the case. Was there anything else you wanted to know?"

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "The lieutenant is a police officer..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant is a police officer of the *old school*. His concerns are material and extrinsic.

fields.Title: You: "What, no. That can't be right."
fields.Dialogue Text: What, no. That can't be right.
"You mean cannabis?"
"Very funny, lieutenant."
"I have, on a few occasions -- when I was young and foolish -- smoked hemp."

fields.Title: You: ""Beat it. You're cramping my style.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Beat it. You're cramping my style."

fields.Title: You: ""No. I'll wing it.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "No. I'll wing it."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Then you're in luck, because we're..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Then you're in luck, because we're in the midst of a *major* strike by the Dockworkers' Union. Maybe more than that. The Union clearly wants a *piece*, not just of the Industrial Harbour, but the Wild Pines corporation itself..."

fields.Title: You: "Say nothing."
fields.Dialogue Text: Say nothing.

fields.Title: You: ""You see, Kim. I have this place in..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You see, Kim. I have this place in my head." (Point to your head.) "Where I develop new ideas and connections."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I do not harbour a sentiment for r..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I do not harbour a sentiment for revolutionary air brigades in particular."

fields.Title: You: ""In this special place I have come..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "In this special place I have come to suspect that you have some kind of *thing* with the revolutionary air brigades."

fields.Title: Drama: "The *revolutionary* must have added..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The *revolutionary* must have added a little lustre to it, for a ten-year-old Kitsuragi. He will never admit it though.

fields.Title: You: ""Are you sure the *revolutionary* h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Are you sure the *revolutionary* has got nothing to do with this?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I've noticed -- and okay. The Revo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I've noticed -- and okay. The Revolution employed a more forward-looking eight-rotor design. Their blades were foldable and their pilots were better trained and motivated."

fields.Title: You: ""Why's that?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why's that?"

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "You're super lucid -- yet psychedel..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You're super lucid -- yet psychedelic. You don't need office supplies to connect to your nervous system, you're *special*.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay -- was there anything else?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay -- was there anything else?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""If you ask me, it's past time for..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "If you ask me, it's past time for you to cut back on the smoking. You seem like a man with a death wish. It's quite disturbing."

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "The name "Kim 'Pinball' Kitsuragi"..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The name "Kim 'Pinball' Kitsuragi" appears before you.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "One hundred and four."
fields.Dialogue Text: One hundred and four.

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "He is not the least bit offended. H..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He is not the least bit offended. He just wants you to know his case load should be much higher.

fields.Title: You: ""There can only be one conclusion:..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There can only be one conclusion: I am the finest, a case-solving machine sent to outperform you in every way imaginable."
fields.Alternate1: "There can only be one conclusion: I am the finest we have, a hero cop sent to outperform you in every way imaginable."

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "He means The New, the third decade..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He means The New, the third decade of the current century. The decade of disco, decadence, and the victory of democracy-powered free market economy over it's critics.

fields.Title: You: ""I arrive at the scene three days e..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I arrive at the scene three days early, drink myself to oblivion, fully re-immerse myself in this reality and then work the case from an angle so crescent fresh it produces *never before seen* results. Not only for criminology, but for the human mind."

fields.Title: You: ""I am a notoriously difficult-to-wo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I am a notoriously difficult-to-work-with *wunderkind* with extremely  unorthodox methods."

fields.Title: You: ""No, it's not that bad. I'm sure we..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, it's not that bad. I'm sure we have officers way more mentally ill than me."

fields.Title: You: ""What is *the gift*?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What is *the gift*?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's a good thing you found that g..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's a good thing you found that gun. I can see why they sent you now."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "No response. He just arches his bro..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No response. He just arches his brow.

fields.Title: Perception (Smell): "The lieutenant's aftershave. A comm..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant's aftershave. A common drugstore brand. Strong hints of pine needle.

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "*See*? You're clearly not a man in..."
fields.Dialogue Text: *See*? You're clearly not a man in your prime anymore.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I find that highly unlikely. It's..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I find that highly unlikely. It's not unusual for detectives to feel complicit in the crime until the perpetrator is apprehended. Especially when the investigation is dragging. So let's get back to it, shall we?"

fields.Title: You: ""I just feel this sense of doom, li..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I just feel this sense of doom, like an awful thing has happened."
fields.Alternate1: "My chest feels hollow, like I did something terrible."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You did well," the lieutenant says..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You did well," the lieutenant says as soon as you've left the apartment. The balcony feels cool and quiet, with a stunning view over the district.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "The lieutenant is pretty sure *styl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant is pretty sure *style* is just a euphemism for *nihilistic binge-drinking*.

fields.Title: You: ""Uhm. I want to talk about *you*.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Uhm. I want to talk about *you*."

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "But this isn't an *old school* case..."
fields.Dialogue Text: But this isn't an *old school* case.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""So, what? That makes *you* the *ne..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So, what? That makes *you* the *new school*? Gods spare us..."
"Relax, Kim. I'm down with hemp."
The words are true, milord. No love for the herb in the lieutenant.
"It's not a big deal. I don't do it any more." An almost imperceptible sigh. "But it happened a few times. In my twenties."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's dark," the lieutenant states..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's dark," the lieutenant states the obvious.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Excuse me?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Excuse me?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm sure you don't. It's just a st..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm sure you don't. It's just a stupid inter-departmental thing. I'm making assumptions... we should move on."

fields.Title: You: ""You don't need to *supervise* me,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You don't need to *supervise* me, Kim."

fields.Title: You: ""Fine." (Let it be.)"
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fine." (Let it be.)

fields.Title: You: ""Kim, what if my precinct sent me o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Kim, what if my precinct sent me on this case *because* I'm a fuck up? Like... as a joke."

fields.Title: Empathy: "It is not from a *purely* tactical..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It is not from a *purely* tactical standpoint. We are not ruling out that the lieutenant had a little... rebel phase in that past of his.

fields.Title: You: ""Yes. A brain.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. A brain."

fields.Title: You: ""You're joking.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're joking."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Now -- was there anything else or..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Now -- was there anything else or should we get to it?"

fields.Title: You: ""You don't look like other people a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You don't look like other people around here."

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Tell him. Tell him why it's you."
fields.Dialogue Text: Tell him. Tell him why it's you.

fields.Title: You: ""I have big news, Kim." (Tell Kim a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I have big news, Kim." (Tell Kim about how you no longer obsess over your sexuality.)

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""If you ask me, it's high time for..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "If you ask me, it's high time for you to put the bottle away. Sober up, get back to basics. That would be my advice."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Kim Kitsuragi: ""Was there anything else you wanted..."]
Jump to: [Kim Kitsuragi: ""Was there anything else you wanted..."]
Jump to: [Kim Kitsuragi: ""Was there anything else you wanted..."]
Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes. I'm an unrepentant spoilsport..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. I'm an unrepentant spoilsport." The lieutenant appears pleased with this.

fields.Title: Jump to: [You: ""You think this will make them coop..."]
Kim Kitsuragi: ""Do you *need* something, detective?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Do you *need* something, detective?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Officer, what was that?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Officer, what was that?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You wouldn't have been sent to inv..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You wouldn't have been sent to investigate this case if you had close connections with the Union -- at least that's the hope. Also," he looks you over, "you don't strike me as a *Union man*."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Besides, I doubt you could have ta..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Besides, I doubt you could have taken down a hardened mercenary single-handedly..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm relieved that you agree," he s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm relieved that you agree," he says, then pauses.

fields.Title: You: ""I don't think grounding one or the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't think grounding one or the other side into pigsfeed will do anyone favours. I am really, really smart."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "The lieutenant is pretty sure *self..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant is pretty sure *self-care* is just a euphemism for *nihilistic binge-drinking*.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't see how *my* life is perti..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't see how *my* life is pertinent to the investigation."

fields.Title: You: ""You're right. What's there to know..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're right. What's there to know about a lame binoclard?"

fields.Title: You: "(Stroke your chin thoughtfully.) "I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Stroke your chin thoughtfully.) "I've always believed in mind over matter."
The lieutenant immediately grasps the stakes. His gears turn as he prepares a devastating counter. This could get ugly...
"You brought this on yourself."
Your fingers trace the edges of an imaginary holster on your hip. A slight twitch runs through your index finger.

fields.Title: Jump to: [Kim Kitsuragi: "A moment passes. The lieutenant gla..."]
You: ""A young woman told me a mercenary..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A young woman told me a mercenary has been hanged, and the manager thinks it was the Union that did it. That's all."

fields.Title: Logic: "Clearly he prefers to think you're..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Clearly he prefers to think you're malingering. He cannot fathom that anyone could drink so much as to retroactively erase their entire life.

fields.Title: Empathy: "His disdain is clear. This man woul..."
fields.Dialogue Text: His disdain is clear. This man would not use such an expression otherwise.

fields.Title: You: "Let it go."
fields.Dialogue Text: Let it go.

fields.Title: Jump to: [Kim Kitsuragi: ""Was there anything else you wanted..."]
Logic: "Look at you -- it's because you're..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Look at you -- it's because you're a failure. They sent you to *slight* Precinct 57.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, something isn't happening. Bec..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, something isn't happening. Because it's not part of..." He makes a precise hand gesture: "Reality."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good. Yes. Because it's not part o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good. Yes. Because it's not part of Reality."

fields.Title: You: ""Nowhere. Let's change the subject..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Nowhere. Let's change the subject -- but still keep it on *you*."

fields.Title: You: ""I think it's terrifying.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I think it's terrifying."

fields.Title: You: ""I'm super cool with all of it.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm super cool with all of it."

fields.Title: You: ""What is Seol?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What is Seol?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't think I can say one way or..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't think I can say one way or another. I do think it's somewhat unlikely, though."

fields.Title: You: "(No, I don't.) "Glasses are cool, I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (No, I don't.) "Glasses are cool, I guess."

fields.Title: Composure: "It's like you're *locked down*."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's like you're *locked down*.

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "So desperately mundane. You need to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: So desperately mundane. You need to funk this case up.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Yeah -- damage. He means damage."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yeah -- damage. He means damage.

fields.Title: You: ""What do you mean?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What do you mean?"

fields.Title: You: "(Spread your arms wide.) "For this..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Spread your arms wide.) "For this *whole situation*."

fields.Title: You: ""How did you know?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "How did you know?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Fascinating. And here I believed y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fascinating. And here I believed your recent turn toward moralism was just an act."

fields.Title: You: "Let it go."
fields.Dialogue Text: Let it go.

fields.Title: You: ""What's special about Martinaise?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What's special about Martinaise?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The silence carries."
fields.Dialogue Text: The silence carries.

fields.Title: You: ""I probably have an *unbelievable*..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I probably have an *unbelievable* kill count."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay." He takes a step back. "Styl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay." He takes a step back. "Style me."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He's waiting."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's waiting.

fields.Title: You: ""Of course it's a joke, look at me!..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course it's a joke, look at me! How could I compete with you, you probably have a ton of cases solved."
fields.Alternate1: "Of course it's a joke, look at me! You have over a hundred cases solved, how could I compete with you?"

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "Strangely enough, it's not pity. He..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Strangely enough, it's not pity. He would never pity a fellow officer. He truly appears to think you've solved your fair share of cases -- perhaps more than him.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's good to have...." His mouth t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's good to have...." His mouth twitches as he comes up with the expression: "...an *ambidextrous para-detective* in a labour dispute. I can see why they sent you -- should we go?"

fields.Title: You: ""Ah, so this is a struggle over *wh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ah, so this is a struggle over *who runs Martinaise*!"

fields.Title: You: ""Okay. Forget it.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay. Forget it."

fields.Title: Perception (Smell): "He smells... like a man? A perfectl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He smells... like a man? A perfectly normal man?

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Are you thinking of... you know?"..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Are you thinking of... you know?" He gestures toward his cheeks with an invisible razor.

fields.Title: You: ""Lose *these* bad boys? No way.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Lose *these* bad boys? No way."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""My apologies, detective. I couldn'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "My apologies, detective. I couldn't resist."

fields.Title: You: ""So..." (Point to your face.) "I sh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So..." (Point to your face.) "I shaved."

fields.Title: You: ""Lieutenant, I have a confession to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Lieutenant, I have a confession to make. *I* am the murderer."

fields.Title: You: ""But it all makes so much sense! It..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "But it all makes so much sense! It would have been *so* convenient for me to forget all about the murder, and everything else..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He sighs. "If you insist. What do y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He sighs. "If you insist. What do you want to know?"

fields.Title: You: ""Tell me a secret about yourself.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Tell me a secret about yourself."

fields.Title: You: ""That's all for now." (Conclude.)"
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's all for now." (Conclude.)

fields.Title: You: ""Do you ever *talk* with yourself?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Do you ever *talk* with yourself?"

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "The lieutenant's Conceptualization..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant's Conceptualization skills must be rather *rudimentary*.

fields.Title: You: ""I didn't know they *let* binoclard..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I didn't know they *let* binoclards become cops."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant relaxes his eyebrow,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant relaxes his eyebrow, and you seem to regain control of yourself.
Keep your brow steady, but slowly nod your head as a flourish.
"We should hit a blunt some time."
fields.Alternate1: "We should hit the hemp some time."
fields.Alternate2: "We should hit one of those flaming tubes some time."

fields.Dialogue Text: An almost imperceptible snap inside the lieutenant. His shoulders relax, his eyebrow casually descending as he tries his best to look relaxed, nonchalant even.
The *chaise electrique*?
Goddamn right something's the matter! Lieutenant Eyebrow here thinks he can shut you down like some brow-less freak? Thinks you're just going to lie back and take it?!

fields.Title: You: ""How's that?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "How's that?"

fields.Title: You: ""That's all I needed to know.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's all I needed to know."

fields.Title: You: ""I was thinking something other-wor..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I was thinking something other-worldly might be involved. You know, something *supra-natural*."

fields.Title: You: ""Personally, I think labour dispute..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Personally, I think labour disputes are *very* mysterious."

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "What if *you* did it?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What if *you* did it?

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I can assure nothing like that wil..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I can assure nothing like that will happen. Do you know why not?"

fields.Title: You: ""Okay indeed. And in this *atelier*..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay indeed. And in this *atelier* I have realized that you harbour some kind of *sentiment* toward the revolutionary air brigades."

fields.Title: You: ""Thank you. My mind is satisfied."..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Thank you. My mind is satisfied." (Point to your head again.)

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's because I'm half-Seolite. O..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's because I'm half-Seolite. Or quarter. My father's father was from Seol -- so was my grandmother, but from my mother's side..." He shakes his head. "It's not an interesting topic."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "A point of pride to him."
fields.Dialogue Text: A point of pride to him.

fields.Title: You: "(I'm not gonna call him a bino.) "G..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (I'm not gonna call him a bino.) "Glasses are cool."

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Cut this boring stuff off immediate..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Cut this boring stuff off immediately. You know what this case is about!

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What?"

fields.Title: You: ""Kim! We need to talk about... *res..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Kim! We need to talk about... *responsibility*."

fields.Title: You: ""No, no. I meant like *la responsab..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, no. I meant like *la responsabilité*. You know, the kind that gets assigned."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Later." His voice is unflinching...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Later." His voice is unflinching. "Was there anything else you wanted to know about the case?"

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "The rows are endless."
fields.Dialogue Text: The rows are endless.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant is thinking to himse..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant is thinking to himself. His eyebrows are slightly raised.

fields.Title: You: ""For some reason I thought you had..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "For some reason I thought you had a hundred and *four* solved cases."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm good enough for this case. I'm..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm good enough for this case. I'm not here to compete. I came because I had to. My fellow officers -- the sergeants, in particular -- would have made this scene into a circus."

fields.Title: Shivers: "A tremble comes over you, another a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A tremble comes over you, another after-effect of ethanol poisoning perhaps? Feels like leaves do when they rustle in the breeze, somewhere far away, below the Turbine. The 41st and the 57th... The lieutenant was right. It's not about who gets what's North, it's about who doesn't.

fields.Title: Logic: "Clearly, he has already formed his..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Clearly, he has already formed his own theory.

fields.Title: You: ""I know it seems unintuitive. But t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I know it seems unintuitive. But trust me."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Really?" His eyebrow gets raised o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Really?" His eyebrow gets raised one more notch.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's not that many. Officer, I'm s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's not that many. Officer, I'm sure you have a lot more cases solved. Now..."

fields.Title: Jump to: [KIM SWITCH / SPOKE TO SPEEDFREAKS]
Rhetoric: "But what sort of *ideological* pict..."
fields.Dialogue Text: But what sort of *ideological* picture do these smells paint? Tough to say...

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Wait-wait. There's *something* ther..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Wait-wait. There's *something* there, something that sets your GABA-receptors aflutter.

fields.Title: You: ""Let me just make this perfectly cl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let me just make this perfectly clear -- our job here... is to find *the killer*?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""When you said before that you were..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "When you said before that you were *down with racism* -- was it meant in earnest or were you just trying to win his confidence?"

fields.Title: You: ""Kim... I think *I* may be the murd..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Kim... I think *I* may be the murderer. I killed the man and then tricked myself into forgetting about it."

fields.Title: You: "What nonsense. [Discard the idea.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: What nonsense. [Discard the idea.]

fields.Title: You: ""I'm a bad person. I believe I coul..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm a bad person. I believe I could have done anything."

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "There's something the lieutenant is..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There's something the lieutenant isn't seeing. The universe is too irrational, too morally complex. You should convince him.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I guess you *don't* need glasses,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I guess you *don't* need glasses, then."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant's face turns a ruddy..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant's face turns a ruddy shade. "I can *assure* you, detective, that I've passed *all* the required physical exams within the last year. Can you say the same?"
Heavy drops of rain fall on the colliding eyebrows and run down the worn faces. The world outside this stand-off almost doesn't exist.
(Raise it cautiously.) "You sure you wanna do this, Kim?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't know. Containers... contai..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't know. Containers... contain, I guess. I'm making assumptions. We should move on."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What do you want to know?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What do you want to know?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Three days ago, the RCM Emergencie..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Three days ago, the RCM Emergencies Desk received a report about a security guard who was found hanged in Martinaise. An anonymous caller said there was a dead body behind the Whirling-in-Rags hostel-cafeteria. The cadaver had been there for four days -- no one had come to investigate..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""During that time, the victim had b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "During that time, the victim had been stripped of his belongings. The caller did not identify him, but used the word *lynching*. There is an ongoing labour dispute between the local dockworkers and the logistics company Wild Pines. I was told we should approach the death as part of this dispute."

fields.Title: You: ""Literally *anything* about it -- I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Literally *anything* about it -- I can't remember a single thing."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Strike, coup, revolution, it's bri..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Strike, coup, revolution, it's brigandage however you parse it."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Have you tried concentrating on so..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Have you tried concentrating on something other than your personal affairs?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Then you should consider seeking m..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Then you should consider seeking medical attention. You can use the radio in my Kineema to call your station's *lazareth*. Was there anything else you wanted?"

fields.Title: Jump to: [Kim Kitsuragi: ""Focus on *other* people's troubles..."]
Kim Kitsuragi: ""You don't know?" His eyes narrow...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You don't know?" His eyes narrow. "I assumed you were in on it."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I hope you do.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I hope you do."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, not *really*. Was there anythi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, not *really*. Was there anything else?"

fields.Title: You: "Did... what? The hanged man?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Did... what? The hanged man?

fields.Title: You: ""And those look like airman pants...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And those look like airman pants. Good for storing tools in."

fields.Title: You: ""Just air brigades then?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Just air brigades then?"

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Seol is a protectionist, isolationi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Seol is a protectionist, isolationist panisiolary state west of the Insulindian isola. Actually, it's *quite* interesting; some would even say mysterious...

fields.Title: Suggestion: "He's actually glad it's addressed n..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's actually glad it's addressed now.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I checked the records. This jurisd..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I checked the records. This jurisdiction dispute -- who polices Martinaise -- reaches back to the Thirties. It's as old as my station. And all this time we can't decide who gets Martinaise? I think, yes, both stations would prefer a win."

fields.Title: You: ""What did your preliminary informat..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What did your preliminary information say about it? Before you came here?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Ah, I'm glad to hear it, detective..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ah, I'm glad to hear it, detective. I was wondering when we'd get to this very subject."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Kim Kitsuragi: ""Was there anything else you wanted..."]
Jump to: [Kim Kitsuragi: ""Was there anything else you wanted..."]
You: "Look for: Precinct 57 -> Lieutenant..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Look for: Precinct 57 -> Lieutenants -> Kitsuragi, Kim.

fields.Title: You: ""I'm gonna leave why I was sent *un..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm gonna leave why I was sent *unspecified*."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""In the New, twenty years ago. It's..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "In the New, twenty years ago. It's what a modern cop looked like then."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""So the 41st Precinct sent you, bec..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So the 41st Precinct sent you, because you are the most mentally ill out of all the officers at your station?"

fields.Title: You: ""I don't know, I don't remember any..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't know, I don't remember any of the other officers."
fields.Alternate1: "I don't remember any of the other officers. Just a handful of names, but they mean nothing to me."

fields.Title: You: ""I will only use lethal force with..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I will only use lethal force with the utmost care and precision."

fields.Title: You: ""It's not a burden, it's a gift.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's not a burden, it's a gift."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Either way, good on you." The lieu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Either way, good on you." The lieutenant gathers himself. "You were saying...?"

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Perhaps you did it for the Union --..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Perhaps you did it for the Union -- your political beliefs inspired this extreme act of violence.

fields.Title: You: ""We should ground the *owners* into..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We should ground the *owners* into fine paste and feed them to the pigs."

fields.Title: You: ""Oh, I guess that settles it, then.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh, I guess that settles it, then."

fields.Title: Logic: "Just think about it for a second. Y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Just think about it for a second. You're a raging alcoholic who showed up three days late wearing piss-stained disco garb. You weren't sent here to *win*.
fields.Alternate1: Just think about it for a second. You're a raging alcoholic who showed up three days late and argues with his necktie. You weren't sent here to *win*.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's correct.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's correct."
"Yes, cannabis. The hemp. I rolled it into a small paper tube and lit in on fire. Then I *inhaled* the fumes. I was young."
There's a hint of defensiveness in his voice. Even this minor act of rebellion is important to the lieutenant's self-construction.
The lieutenant anticipates your move but can neither deflect nor parry your counter-counter assault. A single drop of sweat trickles down his cheek...
(Raise it smugly.) "I don't know, *is* there?"

fields.Title: You: ""Nothing. Just an observation.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Nothing. Just an observation."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I hope you don't take this the wro..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I hope you don't take this the wrong way, it's just a collegial observation. In the 57th we call it the 'Jamrock shuffle'. Officers from Jamrock's 41st Precinct tend to move a bit erratically."

fields.Title: You: ""I know what the RCM is.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I know what the RCM is."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Kim Kitsuragi: "A moment passes. The lieutenant gla..."]
You: ""I'm afraid this is a medical situa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm afraid this is a medical situation." (Move on.)

fields.Title: You: ""I'm talking deep, neurological dam..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm talking deep, neurological damage here."
fields.Alternate1: "I'm talking deep, neurological damage here. I saw myself in the mirror and had no idea who I was."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's just stupidity. We shouldn't..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's just stupidity. We shouldn't waste any more time on it. If you want my take, ask me after we've inspected the victim."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good." The lieutenant nods."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good." The lieutenant nods.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There was some interest in this ca..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There was some interest in this case at my station, but not for the reasons you have in mind. You seem to wish there was..."

fields.Title: You: ""Absolutely nothing?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Absolutely nothing?"
fields.Alternate1: "It's okay to tell me, I'm a major fan of Mazovian socio-economics myself."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay -- let's *talk* about it. You..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay -- let's *talk* about it. You stole the boots." He looks at the gleaming technological footwear you're sporting.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm glad to hear that. I'm glad to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm glad to hear that. I'm glad to see you're stable." He nods approvingly. "Keep it that way. Now -- was there anything else, or should we get to it?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Of course." Sounds like you just a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course." Sounds like you just answered his question.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Safe? No. But you're old. You've m..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Safe? No. But you're old. You've made it this far. *Something* has brought you through. We've only just started working together, so I don't know what it is yet. But it's there."

fields.Title: You: ""Aren't we going to talk about the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Aren't we going to talk about the boots I'm wearing?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Why are you pronouncing it like yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why are you pronouncing it like you're a Coalition bureaucrat?"
fields.Alternate1: "Why are you pronouncing it like that gentleman from the Institute of Price Stabilité?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You know what? Forget it. What *sp..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You know what? Forget it. What *specifically* are you trying to assign responsibility *for*?"

fields.Title: You: "(Point to yourself.) "For my disast..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Point to yourself.) "For my disaster of a life."

fields.Title: You: ""No, it's way more nuanced than tha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, it's way more nuanced than that. There's like this whole historical or socio-economic dimension to it."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Kim Kitsuragi: ""Was there anything else you wanted..."]
Jump to: [Empathy: "He's avoiding your gaze. This is th..."]
You: "Confirmed kills?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Confirmed kills?

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Martinaise? Nothing. It's just a p..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Martinaise? Nothing. It's just a puddle at the end of some drainpipe. No one cares about this place, they care about sports. Most of our colleagues don't even know how to get here. North of the Interchange doesn't exist."

fields.Title: You: ""I am a highly experimental cop. Bu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I am a highly experimental cop. But if I am right... this is *outré* even by my standards."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't need a patrol cap.""]
Kim Kitsuragi: ""No I don't. I *used* to. Plain clo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No I don't. I *used* to. Plain clothes did the trick. For both of us, it seems." He nods toward you. "Now..."

fields.Title: You: ""Of course not. I'm just a drunk. T..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course not. I'm just a drunk. They sent a drunk."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I agree. Too dark.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I agree. Too dark."

fields.Title: You: ""It's both a burden -- and a gift.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's both a burden -- and a gift."

fields.Title: Perception (Smell): "The lieutenant is fastidious as a c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant is fastidious as a cat in matters of his personal upkeep. And yet, in the folds of his jacket you can just perceive the stale and acrid traces of oil rags, transmission fluid, and brake pads.

fields.Title: You: ""Nope, we're good.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Nope, we're good."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Kim Kitsuragi: "A moment passes. The lieutenant gla..."]
Kim Kitsuragi: ""This is not going quite as I hoped..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This is not going quite as I hoped it would, detective." The lieutenant's voice is hushed.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We should think about calling it a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We should think about calling it a day, maybe? The nights are still miserably cold this time of year."

fields.Title: Half Light: "It wasn't that you were horrified -..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It wasn't that you were horrified -- you were just surprised by your own daring!

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What about me?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What about me?"

fields.Title: Volition: "Whatever their reasoning, there's n..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Whatever their reasoning, there's nothing written that says you have to prove them *right*.

fields.Title: You: ""So how do you... you know..." (Tap..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So how do you... you know..." (Tap the side of your head.)

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What, *think*? I do most of my wor..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What, *think*? I do most of my work inside my notebook..."
Snowflakes fall and immediately melt in the heat of the colliding eyebrows. Nothing exists outside this moment.
"Besides, those days are long behind me."
"Yes." He nods. "Let's hurry now, I'm living on borrowed time."

fields.Title: You: ""You're kidding me? Why containers?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're kidding me? Why containers?"

fields.Title: You: ""Okay then.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay then."

fields.Title: You: ""What's the RCM?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What's the RCM?"

fields.Title: You: ""I know literally nothing about it...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I know literally nothing about it. Only what you told me before."

fields.Title: You: ""Why not?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why not?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Do you want me to brief you?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Do you want me to brief you?"

fields.Title: You: ""Tell me about it.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Tell me about it."

fields.Title: You: ""You know what I'm in on -- retrogr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You know what I'm in on -- retrograde amnesia."

fields.Title: You: "Did what? I can't even remember wha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Did what? I can't even remember what the case is. What was it...

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "He's about to say it's impossible."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's about to say it's impossible.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's not.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let's not."

fields.Title: You: ""I found out what the *pale* is whi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I found out what the *pale* is while you were gone."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You're barking up the wrong tree...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're barking up the wrong tree. I don't speak a word of Seolite, I've never met either one of my grandparents. And I've never *been* to Seol." He seems almost proud of these things. "I'm a regular Revacholiere."

fields.Title: Empathy: "He's glad to have shot down your qu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's glad to have shot down your question.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, it's a wholly pointless matte..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, it's a wholly pointless matter. Forget I ever mentioned it."

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "He's basically *challenging* you to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's basically *challenging* you to sex it up with some lurid twist. Don't get right into it, sit on it a bit -- then hit him with it!

fields.Title: You: ""Just one thing though...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Just one thing though..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""To be completely honest, detective..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "To be completely honest, detective, I've been meaning to raise that very subject with you."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""So what *are* we talking about, th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So what *are* we talking about, then?"

fields.Title: You: ""Why didn't we know anything about..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why didn't we know anything about the caller?"

fields.Title: Jump to: [Kim Kitsuragi: ""Was there anything else you wanted..."]
You: "Blink."
fields.Dialogue Text: Blink.

fields.Title: You: "Open your eyes."
fields.Dialogue Text: Open your eyes.

fields.Title: You: ""I wonder what this says about me?..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I wonder what this says about me? That I was sent by my station?"

fields.Title: Logic: "Because you're the best qualified?..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Because you're the best qualified? No, that doesn't seem right...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Mental illness.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Mental illness."

fields.Title: You: ""I think I have it.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I think I have it."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I bet you do.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I bet you do."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant considers your mutto..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant considers your muttonchops for a long moment. A slight grimace crosses his face.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He sighs. "Well, we've yet to find..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He sighs. "Well, we've yet to find any real evidence pointing to you in this case, or even a possible motive, so let's not add you to the list of suspects just yet."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I've been meaning to have a little..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I've been meaning to have a little chat with you about your sense of *style*."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Politics is habit-forming. And haz..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Politics is habit-forming. And hazardous. It is also irrelevant to policework. You are right to doubt the impulse, it might be detrimental to our task here."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I can't say that it does, no. When..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I can't say that it does, no. When I need to think, I just use my notebook..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "Your brain sends the signal to your..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Your brain sends the signal to your lips but they refuse the order. Something is paralysing them. You're pretty sure it has something to do with the lieutenant's eyebrow.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant relaxes his eyebrow,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant relaxes his eyebrow, and you seem to regain control of yourself.
This seems dangerous. What if someone gets hurt?

fields.Title: You: ""We should ground the workers into..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We should ground the workers into fine paste and feed them to the pigs."

fields.Title: You: ""I really don't remember anything...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I really don't remember anything. There was drinking involved."
fields.Alternate1: "I feel like I must repeat this -- I don't remember *anything.* There was heavy drinking involved."

fields.Title: Inland Empire: ""It" is murder, of course. Murder...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It" is murder, of course. Murder. It can't be anything else. And *you* did it. And then, horrified by your own actions, you drowned out the memory...

fields.Title: You: ""Kim, you're wearing a revolutionar..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Kim, you're wearing a revolutionary air brigade jacket, aren't you?"

fields.Title: You: ""No, it's more than that. Anyway.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, it's more than that. Anyway."

fields.Title: You: ""No, normal people don't have this...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, normal people don't have this. It's like a mind laboratory. A spiritual R&D division. No, a pallet! No, better yet -- a painter's atelier of concepts!"

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "I don't care about your insane thef..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I don't care about your insane theft, the lieutenant thinks and looks away from the boots. Just know: if anyone asks me, I *will* snitch on you.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It was a joke, sadly. There's noth..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It was a joke, sadly. There's nothing I can do about your delinquency." He sighs. "What's done is done. Let's get back to policework."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""In Elysium," he replies. "Behind o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "In Elysium," he replies. "Behind our eyes. Like all human beings, detective." He looks around and sighs. "The world is what it is. I'm glad to see you're stable. Keep it that way."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It *all* seems unreal, detective...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It *all* seems unreal, detective. In actuality, the pale is no more unreal than, say, water. Or death. Or that we're stuck behind our eyes, between our own ears, talking..." He looks around, pensive suddenly.

fields.Title: You: ""Ha, so you *are* their finest.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ha, so you *are* their finest."

fields.Title: You: ""Tell me about the case again.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Tell me about the case again."

fields.Title: You: ""Nothing. Actually, as I'm saying t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Nothing. Actually, as I'm saying this, I realize I would not be telling the truth."

fields.Title: You: "Nod."
fields.Dialogue Text: Nod.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You didn't stop at all, did you? Y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You didn't stop at all, did you? You're just obsessing about *other people's* sexuality now."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, uhm..." The lieutenant stares..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, uhm..." The lieutenant stares at your shaven face, his eyes narrowed. "Uhhhh..." he mumbles. "I don't know what to say." He coughs. "Perhaps..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's us. The Revachol Citizens M..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's us. The Revachol Citizens Militia. We're the police in this city."

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "The RCM, or the Revachol Citizens M..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The RCM, or the Revachol Citizens Militia, is the police force you and him are part of. A self-organized peace corps of the occupied city of Revachol, the RCM operates within a legal twilight, yet its authority is rarely questioned. It's *super useful* to know this.

fields.Title: You: ""I can't give up street drugs now...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I can't give up street drugs now. I *just* got addicted to them!"

fields.Title: You: ""Don't be scared, but I think I mig..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Don't be scared, but I think I might have supra-natural abilities."

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["whirling.necktie_personified"]  or  Variable["whirling.klaasje_shivers_forever"]  or  Variable["plaza.shivers_activated"]  or  Variable["jam.tommy_shivers_across_revachol"]  or  Variable["plaza.kineema_shivers_where_too"]  or  Variable["pier.joyce_shivers_grounding_on_revchopice"]  or  Variable["whirling.kim_shivers_orphan"]

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "No."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Which school do you subscribe to -..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Which school do you subscribe to -- Mambo..." He opens the other hand: "...or Jambo?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He opens one hand and looks at it...."
fields.Dialogue Text: He opens one hand and looks at it. A moment passes.

fields.Title: You: ""It's nothing major. Just feels a b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's nothing major. Just feels a bit strange that's all."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There is no gift. We should move.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "There is no gift. We should move."

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Wait-wait. There's something else t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Wait-wait. There's something else there, something that sets your GABA-receptors aflutter.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's a good point. It could happ..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's a good point. It could happen any day now."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This might be just the place to he..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This might be just the place to help you rectify your... financial situation."

fields.Title: You: ""Is there anything else? You look l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Is there anything else? You look like you were about to say something."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Extremely.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Extremely."

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Is it not?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Is it not?

fields.Title: You: ""You know, when you're thinking. Do..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You know, when you're thinking. Do you ever have *conversations* with, like, your brain?"

fields.Title: You: "No, that makes sense! I'm *exceedin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No, that makes sense! I'm *exceedingly* qualified!

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Well, sort of. It's less a matter..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well, sort of. It's less a matter of who *gets* to police Martinaise than who *has* to. It's an orphan district, in other words..."

fields.Title: You: "Ask again."
fields.Dialogue Text: Ask again.

fields.Title: You: "So what can I *do* about it?"
fields.Dialogue Text: So what can I *do* about it?

fields.Title: Authority: "*Nothing*. You better hope he doesn..."
fields.Dialogue Text: *Nothing*. You better hope he doesn't abuse his authority. There's *a lot* of it.
After decades unchallenged, the lieutenant's reaction is a bit slow, but he's not letting you have this. Not for a second. This could get ugly...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""They say it's a scene-clearing tec..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "They say it's a scene-clearing technique developed by one of your lieutenants for gathering evidence. It's erratic, yet thorough. Prioritises containers."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Some *you* time?" The lieutenant c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Some *you* time?" The lieutenant considers this a moment. "This is a police investigation, not a journey of self-discovery. You'll still have your evenings to yourself."

fields.Title: You: ""The guy behind the counter thinks..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The guy behind the counter thinks some Union people hanged a man."

fields.Title: You: ""Who was the caller?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Who was the caller?"

fields.Title: You: ""Wait, so is this a *strike* or an..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wait, so is this a *strike* or an attempted *coup*?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Better still than an imbecilic *Co..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Better still than an imbecilic *Cop Off*."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The *cop* kind. Our Precincts can'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The *cop* kind. Our Precincts can't decide if Martinaise is part of Jamrock or the Industrial Harbour. *Yours* or *mine*, as if we somehow *own* parts of the city. Typical street-gang mentality.... so we've let the Union make a mockery of law enforcement here. And now it's come to its natural conclusion."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay, I admit to it. The Revolutio..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay, I admit to it. The Revolution employed a more forward-looking eight-rotor design. Their blades were foldable and their pilots were better trained and motivated."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "He's having trouble processing it...."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's having trouble processing it. *Believing* it even.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Mhm. I don't speak a word of Seoli..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Mhm. I don't speak a word of Seolite and I've never met either one of my grandparents. There is nothing *ethnic* I can tell you. Or anyone else."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's a part of the world, officer...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's a part of the world, officer. A geopolitical entity -- *and* a geographic division. I told you it wouldn't be interesting."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Was there anything else you wanted..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Was there anything else you wanted to ask about the competition? If not, we should move."

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "So he volunteered to represent the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: So he volunteered to represent the 57th, but not out of competitiveness -- on the contrary.

fields.Title: You: "Look for: Precinct 41."
fields.Dialogue Text: Look for: Precinct 41.

fields.Title: You: ""Let's be honest: 102 is pathetic...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let's be honest: 102 is pathetic. A very small number."

fields.Title: You: "Why did the 41st send me?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Why did the 41st send me?
fields.tooltip5: Put the gun in your mouth

fields.Title: You: ""A joke, of course. Rest assured, I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A joke, of course. Rest assured, I have no intention to compete with you."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Oh? You will?" He raises his colla..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh? You will?" He raises his collar. His eyes narrow. "Then I will *help* you to do so. Now..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's good we set this thing aside.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's good we set this thing aside."

fields.Title: You: ""Wait, which one is the one where y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wait, which one is the one where you hear your tie talk to you?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You're right, detective. My apolog..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're right, detective. My apologies."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Alright, we're finished here. Let'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Alright, we're finished here. Let's quickly debrief and go over what we found -- so we don't do it in front of the company rep."

fields.Title: You: ""I did it for the Union. For the ri..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I did it for the Union. For the rights of the workers."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Look, it's not unusual for detecti..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Look, it's not unusual for detectives to feel complicit in the crime until the perpetrator is identified and apprehended. Especially when the investigation is dragging. So let's get back to it, shall we?"

fields.Title: You: ""I've spent the last 20 seconds dec..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I've spent the last 20 seconds deciding on which side to *ground into pigfeed* -- why?"

fields.Title: You: ""We'll work better together if we h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We'll work better together if we have more rapport."

fields.Title: You: "Yeah, that makes more sense than th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yeah, that makes more sense than the other stuff I thought of.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Ah, right. Your *condition*. Never..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ah, right. Your *condition*. Nevermind. All I mean to say is that we have a puzzle on our hands, but not all the pieces... yet."
Tetrahydrocannabinol is the psychoactive substance in the cannabis plant, commonly known as 'hemp'. It's one of the most common recreational substances in the world.
"All I ask is the chance to close this final case so I can go to the chaise with a clean conscience." His voice is filled with mock pathos. "Let's hurry, I'm living on borrowed time."

fields.Title: You: ""What if I want to work this case a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What if I want to work this case alone?"

fields.Title: You: ""A young woman told me a mercenary'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A young woman told me a mercenary's been hanged -- that's all."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The deceased is a security guard f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The deceased is a security guard for a corporation involved in a labour dispute. It doesn't take a Dolorian polymath to put the pieces together. I just don't see the case getting more *mysterious* than that."

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "The RCM deploys a self-styled struc..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The RCM deploys a self-styled structure called the Décomptage as its chain of command. Every lieutenant is responsible for two sergeants and eight officers. That means the average lieutenant has to deal with quite a few personal affairs. Even you know this.

fields.Title: You: ""So it's true.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "So it's true."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, it just so happens there's a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, it just so happens there's a beautiful, blonde nineteen year old woman at the heart of this case. A rich one, in fact. Part of a murder-sex-cult."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Anyway.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Anyway."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""If you're serious about this, you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "If you're serious about this, you might keep your eyes out for any Coalition officials we might happen to run across."

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Somewhere in your mind hangs a dark..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Somewhere in your mind hangs a dark green blackboard. There are two columns. One says: "cases solved", the other: "confirmed kills".

fields.Title: You: "Cases solved?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Cases solved?

fields.Title: You: ""So, you're still a *good* cop, rig..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So, you're still a *good* cop, right?"

fields.Title: You: ""Okay, enough of the competition th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay, enough of the competition then. Tell me something else." (Conclude.)

fields.Title: You: ""I must be an augury, an apocalypti..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I must be an augury, an apocalyptic omen sent by my people. Can you guess my message?"

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "It's impossible to tell whether he'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's impossible to tell whether he's serious or joking.

fields.Title: You: ""Everything from scalp down is top..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Everything from scalp down is top notch, but you need a patrol cap."

fields.Title: You: ""Orange patrol cap. I can't think o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Orange patrol cap. I can't think of anything else."

fields.Title: Empathy: "He does not actually think it was a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He does not actually think it was a good joke.

fields.Title: You: ""Better not to relay it.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Better not to relay it."

fields.Title: You: ""It is.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "It is."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What happened to you?" the lieuten..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What happened to you?" the lieutenant asks as he leans in, eyes mapping your frozen face.

fields.Title: You: ""Of course. Yes. I understand every..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course. Yes. I understand everything now."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay. Well. We are police officers..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay. Well. We are police officers. It is our job to find the killer. So that's what I intend to do. You should try too."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Kim Kitsuragi: ""The theatrical suicide attempt --..."]
Half Light: "It wasn't that you were horrified -..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It wasn't that you were horrified -- you were just surprised by your own daring!

fields.Title: Logic: "You pick over what's left of your f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You pick over what's left of your frontal cortex, but no compelling explanations emerge...
"Smoked... what?"
"Of course. Here's my gun and my badge." His hands reach out empty. "They'll put me in the chaise for this, but it feels good to have it off my chest."
"Agreed." Only a fraction of a smirk in the corner of his mouth betrays his amusement. "Was there anything else?"

fields.Title: You: ""Tell me about the case.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Tell me about the case."

fields.Title: You: ""You seem to be following me.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You seem to be following me."

fields.Title: You: ""What do you mean *distinctive*?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What do you mean *distinctive*?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Please do," he says. "We wouldn't..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Please do," he says. "We wouldn't want your *regimen* to spill over into the investigation."

fields.Title: You: ""*Brief*, yes. That sounds good.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Brief*, yes. That sounds good."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There's a strong prejudice against..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There's a strong prejudice against involving the RCM in what's seen as *Union matters*. The Dockworkers' Union is the de facto police in Martinaise. Now -- it appears -- they've started executing too. We cannot allow that."

fields.Title: You: ""If we're from different precincts,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "If we're from different precincts, why are we on the same case?"

fields.Title: You: ""Actually, I have all I need for no..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Actually, I have all I need for now."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Maybe you can tell me what you *do..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Maybe you can tell me what you *do* know? To help me narrow it down a bit."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Really?" The lieutenant gives you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Really?" The lieutenant gives you a look, thorough as if performing triage. "You look fine to me."

fields.Title: You: ""Now that we've inspected the scene..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Now that we've inspected the scene -- I want to know more about this 'pissing competition' you mentioned."

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["TASK.inspect_the_dead_body_done"] == true  and  Variable["TASK.pissing_competition"]  and  Variable["TASK.pissing_competition_done"] == false
