fields.Title: Composure: "The gesture resembles an orchestra..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The gesture resembles an orchestra conductor bringing the choir to a full stop.

fields.Title: You: ""Yes. My brain suspects that you ha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. My brain suspects that you have some kind of *thing* with the revolutionary air brigades."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay. I wanted to become an aerost..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay. I wanted to become an aerostatic pilot. Then I turned ten and realized we no longer have an air force."

fields.Title: You: ""Please don't, I was just...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Please don't, I was just..."

fields.Title: You: ""It seems unreal.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "It seems unreal."

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "It's all part of the Masterplan, yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's all part of the Masterplan, you see.

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "We all have our different mediums...."
fields.Dialogue Text: We all have our different mediums. His is written.

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "You could use a good, *normal* pair..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You could use a good, *normal* pair yourself.

fields.Title: Composure: "He's not the least bit curious abou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's not the least bit curious about what you planned to say.

fields.Title: You: ""Are *you* part of the homo-sexual..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Are *you* part of the homo-sexual underground?"

fields.Title: You: ""Hold on, and the RCM is?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hold on, and the RCM is?"

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "One you should be *ashamed* of. It'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: One you should be *ashamed* of. It's no wonder the soft one doesn't want it back. It was right to abandon you...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""In any event, I am just a humble l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "In any event, I am just a humble law official. I may work under the Moralintern's umbrella, but I'm certainly not qualified to serve on any 'committee'."

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "Your brothers have left you."
fields.Dialogue Text: Your brothers have left you.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Local law enforcement solving one..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Local law enforcement solving one little homicide decides nothing. Not solving it... can have real and calculable effects. Things can always get worse. Matter of fact, augury, we should move."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "There is no gift. It must be repeat..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There is no gift. It must be repeated: there is no *Gift*. It is meant as obvious sarcasm. Do not ask what *The Gift* is.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It is good to have a para-detectiv..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It is good to have a para-detective in a labour dispute. I can see why they sent you -- should we go?"

fields.Title: You: ""Why, do you agree?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why, do you agree?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The 41st is known to kill people...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The 41st is known to kill people. Often."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay... About that call.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay... About that call."

fields.Title: Jump to: [You: ""How did you hope it would go?""]
You: ""Do you think I should?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Do you think I should?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Was there something else you wishe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Was there something else you wished to discuss?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Just to be clear -- we are police..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Just to be clear -- we are police officers. It's our job to find the killer. That's the case. Uncover and arrest the killer."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Excellent. Was there anything else?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Excellent. Was there anything else?"

fields.Title: You: ""You're being sarcastic, aren't you?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're being sarcastic, aren't you?"

fields.Title: You: ""I get it -- You're one of those *o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I get it -- You're one of those *old school* detectives." (Nod respectfully.)

fields.Title: Authority: "If the lieutenant were an *evil* ma..."
fields.Dialogue Text: If the lieutenant were an *evil* man, who knows what sort of havoc he could wreak?

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's good to hear. I have little..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's good to hear. I have little patience for the *swinging dick* style of police work. It's patience and intelligence that solves cases... Was there anything else?"
It's as if the entire world is frozen solid in awe of this great clash of brows. Nothing exists outside this moment.
(Jerk it like a powerlifter in a squat-cage.) "Your secrets, lieutenant -- Now!"

fields.Title: Jump to: [Kim Kitsuragi: "A bespectacled man in an orange bom..."]
Kim Kitsuragi: ""Frankly, detective, you're in a de..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Frankly, detective, you're in a deranged state. I can't let you proceed without *close* supervision. In fact, under normal circumstances I'd be duty-bound to report you. Take it as a token of good faith between our precincts that I haven't done so."

fields.Title: Volition: "Oh, so you're an unaccountable wrec..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Oh, so you're an unaccountable wreck who has to be supervised? You don't *have* to take this display of authority, you can disobey!

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's good.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's good."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant adjusts his collar...."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant adjusts his collar. It doesn't look like he *wants* the case to be more mysterious.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There's no reason to *wing* anythi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There's no reason to *wing* anything. If you didn't get the brief, that's okay, I did."

fields.Title: You: ""Why hide themselves?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why hide themselves?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Try work. The case at hand. It can..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Try work. The case at hand. It can work miracles."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Kim Kitsuragi: ""What's there to say? It's just stu..."]
Kim Kitsuragi: ""Do you know the feeling when you'v..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Do you know the feeling when you've begun filling in a crossword but some of your answers don't quite seem to fit? That's the feeling I have right now, for some reason..."

fields.Title: You: ""That's all. I just wanted you to k..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's all. I just wanted you to know I have this thing." (Keep pointing to your head.)

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What, this?" he zips up the large..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What, this?" he zips up the large collar. "It's just seasonal clothing."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Congratulations. That must have ta..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Congratulations. That must have taken an enormous, concerted effort. *Considerable* ingenuity. And timing. Now -- I'm going to report you and you're going to go to jail."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Am I?" He arches his brow. "Anyway..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Am I?" He arches his brow. "Anyway, did you want something -- related to policework?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Sure." He nods. "Anyway, did you w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sure." He nods. "Anyway, did you want something -- related to policework?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I am the finest of nothing.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I am the finest of nothing."

fields.Title: Empathy: "Maybe this is why your chest feels..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Maybe this is why your chest feels so hollow -- you did an awful thing, and you can't even bring yourself to acknowledge it...

fields.Title: You: ""Nothing, let's go." [Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: "Nothing, let's go." [Leave.]

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""... but am I? I'll spare you anoth..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "... but am I? I'll spare you another *20 hour mind-project* -- yes, I am. Now let's get back to work."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Actually it does have to be murder..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Actually it does have to be murder. This is a murder investigation. But we digress."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But isn't that *your* job?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "But isn't that *your* job?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Ah, now I understand..." The lieut..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ah, now I understand..." The lieutenant nods his head gravely.

fields.Title: You: ""Yes, exactly.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, exactly."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Kim Kitsuragi: ""Was there anything else you wanted..."]
Jump to: [Kim Kitsuragi: ""The *cop* kind. Our Precincts can'..."]
Kim Kitsuragi: ""I wouldn't say that. And my case l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I wouldn't say that. And my case load is measly, but that's beside the point..."

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "He neither approves, nor disapprove..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He neither approves, nor disapproves. Yet there is something more there, something you can't put your finger on.

fields.Title: You: ""Hey! I've been doing better.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hey! I've been doing better."

fields.Title: Perception (Smell): "The lieutenant's aftershave. A comm..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant's aftershave. A common drugstore brand. Strong hints of pine needle.

fields.Title: You: ""What is it? You can tell me, Kim.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What is it? You can tell me, Kim."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Morning." He gives you a quick nod..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Morning." He gives you a quick nod.

fields.Title: Empathy: "Maybe this is why your chest feels..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Maybe this is why your chest feels so hollow -- you did an awful thing, and you can't even bring yourself to acknowledge it...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant appears unfazed. "An..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant appears unfazed. "And what has led you to this conclusion?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That is a common side effect of ov..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That is a common side effect of overindulgence. It will pass."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Thus far your memory loss does not..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Thus far your memory loss does not seem to be *convenient* for you or anyone else. Except insofar as you've managed to avoid doing any work."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""So, the death notification..." the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So, the death notification..." the lieutenant says as soon as you've left the apartment.

fields.Title: You: ""Come on, lieutenant, open up a lit..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Come on, lieutenant, open up a little."

fields.Title: You: "Dumb brain, I'm good for nothing."
fields.Dialogue Text: Dumb brain, I'm good for nothing.

fields.Title: Logic: "If you're so well qualified, why ca..."
fields.Dialogue Text: If you're so well qualified, why can't you remember why you were sent? Anyway -- don't keep the lieutenant waiting.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant narrows a single eye..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant narrows a single eyebrow. "No."

fields.Title: You: ""What *is* a crossword?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What *is* a crossword?"

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "You feel a slight urge to put the l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You feel a slight urge to put the lieutenant down for this, but you can't quite muster enough testosterone.

fields.Title: Authority: "What's going on? It's like you're a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What's going on? It's like you're a puppet in his hands.
"Good." Only a fraction of a smirk in the corner of his mouth betrays his amusement. "But enough of this. Was there anything else?"
Smugly, sire. Raise it smugly.
"Let's move on. This has been enough of a detour."
"Is that secret enough for you?"
"You're serious right now?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "A moment passes. The lieutenant gla..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A moment passes. The lieutenant glances at the sports watch on his wrist.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That would be us. The Revachol Cit..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That would be us. The Revachol Citizens Militia."

fields.Title: Volition: "The lieutenant thinks you're some u..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant thinks you're some unaccountable wreck who needs constant supervision, but you don't *have* to listen to him. You're free to disobey.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""When I said we have to navigate co..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "When I said we have to navigate community matters, I did not mean we have any *say* in them. I meant we should be careful. If we are not... the *shit* will blow right in our faces." He makes a quick gesture towards his visage -- where the shit would blow.

fields.Title: You: ""Thank you, oh wise man.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Thank you, oh wise man."

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "And he will help."
fields.Dialogue Text: And he will help.

fields.Title: You: ""Are you *sure* there's not some se..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Are you *sure* there's not some sex-angle we should be considering?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay, Art Cop.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay, Art Cop."

fields.Title: Jump to: [You: ""*Brief*, yes. That sounds good.""]
You: ""These are not the same boots. I li..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "These are not the same boots. I liked them so much I went and bought myself a pair."

fields.Title: You: ""Wait, you're not surprised?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wait, you're not surprised?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""So no, I don't think they sent you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So no, I don't think they sent you as a joke. And even if they did, they are in for a surprise."

fields.Title: Volition: "The eyebrow is exercising *psionic*..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The eyebrow is exercising *psionic* control over you.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Great. Imagine all the time you'll..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Great. Imagine all the time you'll have for work now -- matter of fact, we should get back to it right now."

fields.Title: You: ""You're right, yes. Let's go." [Lea..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're right, yes. Let's go." [Leave]

fields.Title: Interfacing: "Yes, but containers *contain*. Thin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes, but containers *contain*. Things. Shiny things. They're interesting.

fields.Title: You: ""It doesn't *have* to be murder. It..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It doesn't *have* to be murder. It can just be sex."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""And I hope we don't even need to d..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And I hope we don't even need to discuss the *street drugs* you've been abusing..."

fields.Title: Suggestion: "On the surface he's dismissive, but..."
fields.Dialogue Text: On the surface he's dismissive, but there's a conspiratorial glint in his black eyes. If only you knew what *he* would say...

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Six."
fields.Dialogue Text: Six.

fields.Title: You: ""An *orange* patrol cap -- you need..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "An *orange* patrol cap -- you need it."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant's posture becomes ri..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant's posture becomes rigid and uncomfortable as you lean forward and sniff the area just above his shoulder blade...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I do like to *hang around* the mot..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I do like to *hang around* the motor pool every now and then, but that doesn't make me a mechanic."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I do like the way it tingles, thou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I do like the way it tingles, though. It's the only part of shaving I actually look forward to."

fields.Title: You: ""I still don't understand anything.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I still don't understand anything."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Kim Kitsuragi: ""Do you, uh, want to *talk* about w..."]
You: ""With this little foreknowledge I a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "With this little foreknowledge I am unsure which side to grind into pigsfeed. The decision must ferment in me. Also -- *nationalism*."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hmm, perhaps you're a more profici..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hmm, perhaps you're a more proficient *cruciverbalist* than I am. All I mean to say is that we have a puzzle on our hands, but not all the pieces... yet."
He's waiting for a reaction.
The lieutenant is a narcomaniac!
Reflexes take over, the lieutenant's brow meets yours: His fierce counter nearly tears your face off. This could get ugly...
"I appreciate the honesty, lieutenant."
"Sure. There was actually something else I was wondering about..."
There, you've breached his defenses. His secrets are yours.

fields.Title: You: ""Nothing". [Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: "Nothing". [Leave.]

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Detective, if I may be frank -- yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Detective, if I may be frank -- you seem to be in a deranged state. You have trouble remembering things, you've *misplaced* your badge. I cannot let you act in the name of the RCM without supervision until you've regained control of your faculties."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Detective, if I may be frank -- yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Detective, if I may be frank -- you seem to be in a deranged state. You have trouble remembering things. I cannot let you act in the name of the RCM without supervision until you've regained control of your faculties."

fields.Title: You: ""Sounds good.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sounds good."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I expect the case itself to be les..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I expect the case itself to be less challenging than navigating these *community matters*. This district isn't used to the RCM's presence, and the Union rarely overplays its hand -- as it appears to have done in this case..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm afraid you and I are pawns in..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm afraid you and I are pawns in a..." He considers the phrasing. "A *pissing* competition."

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "This habit of dispensing wisdom has..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This habit of dispensing wisdom has been brought to his attention before. He will not think less of you for lashing out -- he is trying to curb it.

fields.Title: You: ""Cop Off?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Cop Off?"

fields.Title: You: "Keep it to yourself."
fields.Dialogue Text: Keep it to yourself.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Interesting. I think it's called a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Interesting. I think it's called a brain."

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "It's no mere brain."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's no mere brain.

fields.Title: You: ""Where *are* we, Lieutenant Kitsura..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Where *are* we, Lieutenant Kitsuragi?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I can't stop a grown man from lear..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I can't stop a grown man from learning about the fundamental geographic and entroponetic features of our world, can I?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Excuse me. Large topics are not my..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Excuse me. Large topics are not my forte. You seem stable enough. Keep it that way. Now -- was there anything else or should we get to it?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Safe? No. But you're old. You've m..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Safe? No. But you're old. You've made it this far. Something has brought you through. I haven't worked with you yet, so I don't know what it is. But it's there."

fields.Title: You: ""I have managed to stop obsessing a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I have managed to stop obsessing about my sexuality."

fields.Title: Drama: "That's the truth."
fields.Dialogue Text: That's the truth.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You mean like a brief? Do you want..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You mean like a brief? Do you want me to brief you?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""If you ask me, it's past time for..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "If you ask me, it's past time for you to lay off the *street drugs* you've been abusing. They really aren't helping us solve the case."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Now, was there anything else?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Now, was there anything else?"

fields.Title: Jump to: [Kim Kitsuragi: ""Was there anything else you wanted..."]
You: ""You should tell me now. This seems..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You should tell me now. This seems relevant."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Well, *technically*," the lieutena..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well, *technically*," the lieutenant says, somewhat sheepishly. "The official record keeper has been known to double-count murder-suicides."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hmm..." He raises an eyebrow, thin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hmm..." He raises an eyebrow, thinking it best to let you make the next move.

fields.Title: You: ""There will be a blood-letting of u..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There will be a blood-letting of unimaginable proportions. Un-imaginable."

fields.Title: You: ""You're right. I am a super-predato..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're right. I am a super-predator. Off leash like this... it's about to get very violent."

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "You sense that there's more to it t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You sense that there's more to it than the lieutenant lets on, but the politics of the issue are too *complex* for your fragile mind to grasp right now. Maybe try again when you have more facts?

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's nothing fancy, just plain old..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's nothing fancy, just plain old Taiga Super Special..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm not really sure about this tur..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm not really sure about this turn of events. I... think the mutton chops might have been a better idea. They sort of seemed to cover up some of the..." He stops.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Any theories about what happened h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Any theories about what happened here?" He gazes down at the sign.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant glances at his elect..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant glances at his electronic wristwatch.

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "Forgetting was merely a matter of c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Forgetting was merely a matter of convenience -- very clever!

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Teenage nonsense," he dead pans. "..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Teenage nonsense," he dead pans. "You would have had to be ready to use lethal force long ago, when you joined the RCM."

fields.Title: Empathy: "He is glad and surprised to see an..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He is glad and surprised to see an officer who can appreciate the less-than spectacular.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good point. Martinaise is *famed*..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good point. Martinaise is *famed* for its occult sex-murder rites. We'll get on it *immediately*."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Binoclard? Is that how they do thi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Binoclard? Is that how they do things over at the 41st? No wonder your clearance rate is so low."
He's not. It's all but a ruse, sire. The lieutenant's peculiar sense of humor.
Let's show him: Raise your brow high, up to high-noon.
"An *orange* patrol cap -- you need it."
(Slowly raise your eyebrow.) "Nothing at all."
Hold steady...

fields.Title: You: "Let it go."
fields.Dialogue Text: Let it go.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Then you're not that far behind, a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Then you're not that far behind, actually. Do you want me to brief you?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""To find him or her is one of our t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "To find him or her is one of our tasks here. For now all we know is that the tone was muffled using a device of some sort -- the desk could identify neither the caller's age nor sex."

fields.Title: You: ""Mega cool. I've heard enough.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Mega cool. I've heard enough."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay then. Was there anything else..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay then. Was there anything else you wanted to know?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Was there anything else you wanted..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Was there anything else you wanted to know about the case?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Fine. We should get through the da..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fine. We should get through the day first. Off-hours begin at 21:00. If you're still having trouble then, I can give you an orientation."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I've considered it." His voice is..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I've considered it." His voice is sombre.

fields.Title: You: ""It doesn't *have* to be a cult. It..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It doesn't *have* to be a cult. It can just be sex-murder."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Because it's not part of..." He ma..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Because it's not part of..." He makes a precise hand gesture: "Reality."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""A security guard or worker of some..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A security guard or worker of some sort, hired by Wild Pines. This was just hearsay from Martinaise, of course. We need to find out the truth."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good." He glances impatiently at h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good." He glances impatiently at his electronic wristwatch.

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "From an imaginary fan."
fields.Dialogue Text: From an imaginary fan.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I can see you're disappointed." A..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I can see you're disappointed." A brief smile. "You're right to be -- I don't speak a word of Seolite. I've never met either one of my grandparents. I've never been to Seol. I'm a regular, garden variety Revacholiere."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I for one hope I don't have to use..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I for one hope I don't have to use my service weapon at all -- like a *normal* police officer."

fields.Title: Logic: "You *look* dumb if you keep the lie..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You *look* dumb if you keep the lieutenant waiting for too long.

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "It can still be an otherwordly sex-..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It can still be an otherwordly sex-mystery *in your head*. With a dark twist, even.

fields.Title: You: ""Yeah, but...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, but..."

fields.Title: Endurance: "Damage."
fields.Dialogue Text: Damage.

fields.Title: You: ""So you volunteered to spoil it.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "So you volunteered to spoil it."

fields.Title: You: ""Forget it, it's too much.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Forget it, it's too much."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Are you sure? Who could say it's n..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Are you sure? Who could say it's not true? If you really don't remember anything.... how would you know?" The thought makes him uneasy. "We should move."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Oh no, it's very imaginable. We fa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh no, it's very imaginable. We fail to place responsibility for the hanging, the harbour company see the situation is out of control so they bring in private military, maybe a gunship, the Union responds in strength. Automatic fire."

fields.Title: You: ""Mambo -- I have a vivid interior...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Mambo -- I have a vivid interior. I *see* and *feel* things."

fields.Title: You: ""I think I might have both Mambo *a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I think I might have both Mambo *and* Jambo -- I imagine strange things and get cold chills too."

fields.Dialogue Text: "White male in his forties -- what more do you need?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant blinks, his mouth sl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant blinks, his mouth slightly open and his body motionless. A microsecond passes.

fields.Title: You: ""But I'm completely lacking in basi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "But I'm completely lacking in basic information about even this organization we're in. Can you help me?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's good.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's good."

fields.Title: You: ""What kind of stupidity?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What kind of stupidity?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What's there to say? It's just stu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What's there to say? It's just stupidity."

fields.Title: Logic: "Of course, it's only a *theory*."
fields.Dialogue Text: Of course, it's only a *theory*.

fields.Title: You: "Convince Kim there's a sexy dark my..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Convince Kim there's a sexy dark mystery twist in the case.

fields.Title: You: ""Wait, does the briefing say who th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wait, does the briefing say who the victim was?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Absolutely nothing.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Absolutely nothing."

fields.Title: Drama: "The *revolutionary* must have added..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The *revolutionary* must have added a little lustre to it, for a ten-year-old Kitsuragi. He will never admit it though.

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "Perhaps I shouldn't have tried, he..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Perhaps I shouldn't have tried, he thinks.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Then I was right to spare you from..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Then I was right to spare you from it, no?" He cracks a little smile. "Anyway, the pale is no more terrifying than, say, water. Or death. Or that we're stuck behind our eyes, for all eternity..." He looks around, pensive suddenly.

fields.Title: You: ""You're only making it *sound* unin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're only making it *sound* uninteresting. I still want to know more about Seol."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Are they? They're mostly just cumb..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Are they? They're mostly just cumbersome."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Mhm.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Mhm."

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "Uhm... uh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Uhm... uh...

fields.Title: You: ""Good. We're on the same page then.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good. We're on the same page then."

fields.Title: You: ""I'm talking about *la responsabili..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm talking about *la responsabilité*. You know, the kind that gets assigned."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Next I suppose you're going to tel..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Next I suppose you're going to tell me you need to form a *committee* to assign this *responsabilité*?"

fields.Title: You: ""Yes, a joke. In truth I will only..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, a joke. In truth I will only moderately humiliate and outperform you."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""If it helps you work better, okay...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "If it helps you work better, okay. See it as competition. But don't expect me to. Now..."

fields.Title: You: ""You know, actually no. I'm not an..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You know, actually no. I'm not an augury. I don't why I said that."

fields.Title: You: ""Jambo -- I get these strange *shiv..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Jambo -- I get these strange *shivers* from being hung over. Just before, a chill whisked down my back."

Kim Kitsuragi: ""Uhhh..." He scratches his cheek. "..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Uhhh..." He scratches his cheek. "I'm really not sure about this turn of events. I may have preferred the mutton chops. They sort of seemed to... cover up the..." He stops.

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "Forgetting was merely a matter of c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Forgetting was merely a matter of convenience -- very clever!

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He purses his lips. "The victim was..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He purses his lips. "The victim wasn't run over by a drunk driver, so, while I can't condone your driving habits, the cases remain unrelated..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He studies your face for signs of o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He studies your face for signs of offence. "Don't take it personally -- it's just that security guards kept on by large corporations tend to be better trained and better armed than officers of the RCM."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I have no idea what you're talking..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I have no idea what you're talking about."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant appears unfazed. "An..."]
You: ""I know exactly what you mean.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I know exactly what you mean."

fields.Title: You: ""Oh, okay.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh, okay."

fields.Title: You: "Give up. There's nothing you can do..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Give up. There's nothing you can do.

fields.Title: Empathy: "Fortunately he is a committed offic..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Fortunately he is a committed officer of the RCM. He'll only use his powers for the good of the investigation.
"You know I have to take this to Internal Affairs, don't you, lieutenant?"
"Alright, I guess there is *one* thing..."
"That's not a secret. Everyone has smoked cannabis."

fields.Title: You: ""That's racist. I don't prioritise..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's racist. I don't prioritise containers."

fields.Title: You: ""Would you say this is a *mysteriou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Would you say this is a *mysterious* case?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Focus on *other* people's troubles..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Focus on *other* people's troubles. Not your own. That is the relief."

fields.Title: You: ""But it's not true, right?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "But it's not true, right?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""As you know, there was considerabl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "As you know, there was considerable interest in this case at my station, but probably not for the reasons you have in mind..."

fields.Title: You: ""Wow, really? That's *mega* sexy!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wow, really? That's *mega* sexy!"

fields.Title: You: ""Why not?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why not?"

fields.Title: You: ""Because it's impossible, I know th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Because it's impossible, I know that. Still..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""And now I do," he nods."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And now I do," he nods.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay. And something happened in th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay. And something happened in that brain?"

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "You feel something... rising throug..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You feel something... rising through you -- a familiar feeling. AN OPINION taking form...

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Perhaps I was overprotective, is wh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Perhaps I was overprotective, is what's insinuated.

fields.Title: You: ""Okay, I guess it's not interesting..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay, I guess it's not interesting then."

fields.Title: Volition: "He's right. There are no airtight t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's right. There are no airtight theories, just paranoia. You've given it some thought, now let it go.

fields.Title: You: ""Do you really see me as a safe bet?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Do you really see me as a safe bet?"

fields.Title: You: "Get back to it. [Leave]"
fields.Dialogue Text: Get back to it. [Leave]

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's just stupidity." The lieutena..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's just stupidity." The lieutenant shakes his head.

fields.Title: You: ""Oh, I'm not giving up drinking. It..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh, I'm not giving up drinking. It's what got me where I am today!"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You know who might be, though? Tha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You know who might be, though? That Mr. Heidelstam, the gentleman near the Feld building with the... distinctive way of speaking."

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "Still, against his better judgement..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Still, against his better judgement, this made him think just a little bit less of you

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Was there something else you wishe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Was there something else you wished to discuss?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's right.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's right."

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "Are you sure you would have had the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Are you sure you would have had the strength to take down a hardened mercenary? You're not in the best shape.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Perhaps you did it for the Union --..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Perhaps you did it for the Union -- your political beliefs gave you the strength and courage to take on such a formidable opponent.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant considers your quest..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant considers your question a moment. Before answering: "No, it's not a particularly mysterious case."

fields.Title: You: ""I have no idea what you mean.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I have no idea what you mean."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant nods."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant nods.

fields.Title: Authority: "This guy's got Authority off the ch..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This guy's got Authority off the charts. With just a flick of his eyebrow he's able to make you his thrall.

fields.Title: You: ""Just observing.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Just observing."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Just because *your* precinct has a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Just because *your* precinct has a reputation for cracking skulls doesn't mean that's the *only* way to solve a case... Was there anything else?"
Too late. The die is cast. This is street-style brow-fighting. Two of a kind but one won't survive.

"How about we 'hit' the crime we came here for instead. And by 'hit' I mean 'solve' it. Solve it *hard*."
